title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when modified.
OB: When the label font size is modified to 18 points, the label height remains unchanged.
EB: After modifying the label font size to 18 points, the label height should dynamically adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the label's font size to "18 points".
